item.title: 里夫斯公布预算案后市场仍处于紧张状态，英国债券下跌
item.description: 英国债券下跌，原因是市场对政府未来几年大规模借贷和财政刺激的新计划仍心存疑虑。【原文：UK bonds fell as the market remains on edge over the government’s new plans for vast borrowing and fiscal stimulus over the coming years.】

item.title: 肯尼亚通货膨胀率降至至少 14 年来的最低水平
item.description: 在燃料、食品和公用事业价格增长放缓之后，肯尼亚的年通货膨胀率降至至少 2010 年以来的最低水平。【原文：Kenya’s annual inflation rate fell to the lowest level since at least 2010 after fuel, food and utility price growth eased.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气市场保持稳定，交易商正在评估该地区的供应平衡状况
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格稳定在每兆瓦时 41 欧元附近，因为交易商评估了喜忧参半的天气预报和持续低迷的燃料需求。【原文：European natural gas prices steadied near €41 a megawatt-hour as traders assess mixed weather forecasts against persistently low demand for the fuel.】

item.title: 南非央行不太可能很快降低 CPI 目标
item.description: 南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）表示，南非不太可能在二月份的预算中制定新的通胀目标。【原文：South Africa is unlikely to have a new inflation target by February’s budget, Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana said.】

item.title: 台湾第三季度经济扩张超预期
item.description: 台湾第三季度的经济增长超过预期，这表明由于人工智能的蓬勃发展，该群岛生产的芯片仍然需求旺盛。【原文：Taiwan’s economy grew more than expected in the third quarter, a sign the chips the archipelago makes remain in high demand due to the AI boom.】

item.title: 韩国金融监察机构将调查韩国锌业的股票出售计划
item.description: 韩国金融监管机构计划审查韩国锌业公司股票出售计划中可能存在的不当行为，理由是该案 "极有可能 "构成不公平交易。【原文：South Korea’s financial watchdog plans to review potential wrongdoings in Korea Zinc Co.’s share sale plan, citing “a high likelihood’ that the case may constitute an unfair trade.】

item.title: 多年限制并未减缓中国对科技主导地位的追求
item.description:
《中国制造 2025》的最新进展。【原文：

An update on Made In China 2025.

】

item.title: 奇货可居：中国制造 2025》是否仍在轨道上？播客
item.description: 奇货可居：中国制造 2025》是否仍在轨道上？播客【原文：Odd Lots: Is Made in China 2025 Still On Track? (Podcast)】

item.title: 尼日利亚最大银行开设香港分行，抢占亚洲市场
item.description: 尼日利亚最大的银行将在香港开设一家新分行，这是其亚洲扩张的第一步。【原文：Nigeria’s biggest bank is opening a new branch in Hong Kong in its first step of Asian expansion.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯历史悠久的泥城旅游业外国直接投资大幅增长
item.description: 负责在利雅得市中心建设一个大型文化遗产项目的沙特公司即将从外国投资者那里获得 4 亿美元的投资，这表明沙特王国在吸引私人资金投入旅游业方面取得了进展。【原文：The Saudi company tasked with building a mega cultural heritage project in the heart of Riyadh is close to securing $400 million from foreign investors, indicating progress in the kingdom’s efforts to draw private funding into the tourism sector.】

item.title: 法国通胀率连续两个月低于欧洲央行 2% 的目标
item.description: 法国通胀率连续第二个月低于欧洲央行 2% 的目标，这为决策者加快降息步伐提供了更多理由。【原文：French inflation came in below the European Central Bank’s 2% target for the second consecutive month, boosting the case for policymakers to quicken the pace of interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 贝莱德比特币 ETF 在美国大选前获得创纪录的资金流入
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：BlackRock Inc.’s Bitcoin fund posted an unprecedented net inflow as speculation over how the US election may play out stirs demand for the largest digital asset.】

item.title: 南非 Eskom 公司反对电力交易许可证
item.description: 电力公用事业公司 Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd. 将请求高等法院审查南非能源监管机构的一项决定，即向多个申请者颁发电力贸易许可证。【原文：Power utility Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd. will ask the High Court to review a decision by South Africa’s energy regulator to grant licenses to multiple applicants to trade in electricity.】

item.title: 壳牌维持回购计划，利润在油价下跌中保持稳定
item.description: 在天然气销售量上升、利润降幅低于预期的情况下，壳牌公司（Shell Plc）保持了股票回购的步伐。【原文：Shell Plc maintained the pace of its share buybacks after profit fell less than expected amid rising sales volumes of natural gas.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司因炼油业务下滑利润降幅超预期
item.description: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）报告称，由于炼油利润和油价下跌，该公司第三季度利润降幅大于预期。【原文：TotalEnergies SE reported a bigger-than-expected drop in profit for the third quarter as refining margins and oil prices fell.】

item.title: 帝斯曼-芬美意因维生素价格上涨而上调盈利预期
item.description: 由于供应中断导致部分维生素价格上涨，帝斯曼-芬美意股份公司今年第二次上调了利润展望。【原文：DSM-Firmenich AG raised its profit outlook for the second time this year as a supply disruption led to price increases in some vitamins.】

item.title: 欧洲天气不佳，中国经济下滑，嘉士伯销量下降
item.description: 嘉士伯公司（Carlsberg A/S）表示，由于欧洲夏季天气不佳和中国消费低迷，第三季度啤酒销量下降。【原文：Carlsberg A/S said that volumes fell in the third quarter, as poor summer weather across Europe and a consumer downturn in China hurt sales of its beer.】

item.title: 欧洲和美国出货量下降导致 Stellantis 收入锐减
item.description: Stellantis NV 的第三季度收入下滑了 27%，原因是该汽车制造商在大多数主要市场的出货量都有所下降。【原文：Stellantis NV’s third-quarter revenues slumped 27% as the automaker’s shipments declined in most of its major markets.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数：英国股市将连续第三天下跌
投资组合收益抵消法郎影响，瑞士联合银行实现九个月盈利
item.description: 由于股票、债券和黄金价格上涨，瑞士国家银行实现了九个月的稳健盈利，增加了在中断两年后重新开始利润分配的可能性。【原文：The Swiss National Bank made a solid nine-month profit on rising equities, bonds and gold prices, increasing the chances for a restart of profit distributions after a two-year break.】

item.title: 亚太地区销售不佳，安海斯-布希销量下滑
item.description: 安海斯-布希英博公司（Anheuser-Busch InBev NV）表示，由于中国和阿根廷的销售持续疲软，啤酒销量的下降幅度超出预期。【原文：Anheuser-Busch InBev NV said beer volumes fell more than expected after continued weaker sales in China and Argentina.】

item.title: 意法半导体第三季度收入因汽车需求疲软而下降
item.description: 意法半导体公司（STMicroelectronics NV）公布营收下滑，原因是该公司的汽车行业客户面临日益恶化的不利因素，该公司表示今年的销售额可能会低于其指导目标的下限。【原文：STMicroelectronics NV reported revenue that fell after the chipmakers’ customers in the automotive industry faced worsening headwinds and said sales would likely come in at the lower end of its guidance for the year.】

item.title: 丰田与 NTT 将向人工智能和自动驾驶领域投资 33 亿美元
item.description: 丰田汽车公司和日本电报电话公司（Nippon Telegraph & Telephone Corp.【原文：Toyota Motor Corp. and Nippon Telegraph & Telephone Corp. have agreed to invest billions to develop autonomous-driving software assisted by artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行从交易中获益，贷款逆风依然存在
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）依靠其投资银行和资产管理部门提升了第三季度的业绩，而贷款业务则继续受到不利因素的困扰。【原文：BNP Paribas SA leaned on its investment banking and asset management units to lift results in the third quarter, as the lending business continued to be plagued by headwinds.】

item.title: 拉加德称欧洲央行通胀目标在望，但斗争尚未结束
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，欧元区消费价格增长正朝着欧洲央行2%的目标迈进，但这场斗争尚未取得胜利。【原文：Euro-area consumer-price growth is headed toward the European Central Bank’s 2% goal, but the fight hasn’t yet been won, according to President Christine Lagarde.】

item.title: 被控操纵股票的 Kakao 亿万富翁获准保释
item.description: 周四，Kakao 公司创始人布莱恩-金（Brian Kim）赢得了免于拘留的自由，这是在韩国互联网行业的一个分水岭案件中，一位亿万富翁在对抗股票操纵指控时做出的让步。【原文：Kakao Corp. founder Brian Kim won his freedom from detention on Thursday, a concession to a billionaire fighting charges of stock manipulation in a watershed case for South Korea’s internet industry.】

item.title: 股票出售计划调查报告发布后，韩国锌业股价下跌
item.description: 据当地媒体报道，韩国市场监管机构可能要求该金属生产商修改其价值 18 亿美元的股票出售计划，韩国锌业公司股价暴跌 23%，扩大了前一天的跌幅。【原文：Shares of Korea Zinc Co. plunged as much as 23%, extending losses from a day earlier, after a local media report that the South Korea’s markets regulator may ask the metal producer to revise its $1.8 billion share sale plan.】

item.title: 法国兴业银行业绩增长得益于证券交易和法国零售业复苏
item.description: 法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）第三季度业绩大幅超出分析师预期，原因是其投资银行家们从更高的交易收入中获利，而且这家法国零售银行也扭亏为盈。【原文：Societe Generale SA broadly beat analysts’ estimates in the third quarter, as its investment bankers profited from higher trading revenue and the French retail bank turned the corner.】

item.title: 印度债券大年十月六个月来首次受挫
item.description: 外国投资者本月将净卖出印度债券，这是自 4 月份以来的首次，当地通胀回升和美国收益率飙升冷却了对卢比债券的兴趣。【原文：Foreign investors are set to net sell Indian bonds this month for the first time since April with a pickup in local inflation and a surge in US yields cooling appetite for rupee debt.】

item.title: 香港首家去主权证券交易委员会上市仍令该行业陷入困境
item.description: 继香港首家由特殊目的收购公司收购的公司上市后，香港的一长串此类交易工具仍在努力寻找目标或获得监管部门的批准。【原文：After Hong Kong’s first listing of a firm acquired by a special purpose acquisition company, a long line of such deal vehicles in the city continues to struggle to find targets or receive regulatory approval.】
